attributes.action: excessive extra charges from a credit union
attributes.additional_details:
THE Co-Opertive bank have started charging people who use a cooperative credit union extra charges regardless of who the customers bank with.

 B.A.C.S. clearance is £3 per transaction cleared within 3/5 days
Every cheque issued for cashing in a local post office £2
Immediate clearance (same day around 5pm) £5
but if you pay £9.99 per month for a pay as you go credit card its free to have your money paid into that
ALSO limiting cash withdrawals to 100/200 per day so those living a distance from the offices have further expense

WE WANT THE GOVERNMENT TO ABOLISH EXTRA HIDDEN CHARGES  FOR CREDIT UNIONS NO FEES FOR THIS AND THAT  as credit unions are used for the poorer in society and should not be stung with charges for this that and the other from organisations designed to help also limiting credit unions to ensure they run fair responsible and in line with cooperative attitude which is to help
